modName: High Resolution Texture - Dragon Priest Helmets (Konahriks Accoutrements)
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][color=#dd7e6b][size=4]DESCRIPTION[/size][/color][/font]
Konahriks Accoutrements MOD Texture Replacers

Clay Mask
Glass Mask
Moonstone Mask
Silver Mask
Stalhrim Mask

[color=#ff00ff]*[/color]include All Hood and includes "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75234/?]High Resolution Texture - Dragon Priest Helmets[/url]" all items.

[color=#ff00ff]*[/color]Heart Stone Mask (Unedited)


[font=Georgia][color=#dd7e6b][size=4]REQUIREMENT[/size][/color][/font]
[url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/226880/]Dragonborn DLC[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32458/?]Konahriks Accoutrements - Dragon Priest Armory[/url] (konahrik_accoutrements.esp [color=#d5a6bd]+[/color] konahrik_accoutrements_db.esp)


[font=Georgia][color=#dd7e6b][size=4]INSTALLING / UPDATES[/size][/color][/font]
NMM: Download/install (Overwrite existing files)
or
Manually: Extract the files, Copy its contents to your ..Skyrim\Data folder and click "yes" to overwrite folders/files.


[font=Georgia][color=#dd7e6b][size=4]RECOMMENDED MODS[/size][/color][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71602/?]Spooky Edits - Blurry Reflections Experiment[/url] (Better Reflection for Masks)
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75063/?]Frankly HD Miraak[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62489/?]Vanilla Ice Cream ENB[/url]


[font=Georgia][color=#dd7e6b][size=4]CREDITS AND THANKS[/size][/color][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2718519/?tb=mods&pUp=1]edhelsereg[/url]Â [color=#c9daf8](Konahriks Accoutrements - Dragon Priest Armory)[/color]
*Thanks to "edhelsereg" created this awesome mod.
*Endorsements, donations should go towards "edhelsereg"



[font=Tahoma]---[/font]
[color=#ffe599]I hope you like the result! Feel free to drop by in the comments section if you have any issues or would like to give feedback.
And upload pictures to the gallery, I'd love to see how they look in your games.[/color][color=#fff2cc]

[font=Tahoma]*ENG is not my first language.[/font][/color]
author: frogf
